answerText: trophosphere[10] The temperature of the trophosphere decreases as you go up, meaning that it has a positive value of this quantity. This quantity is the negative derivative of temperature with respect to altitude.

subject: Science
question: Question: This is the layer where aerosols and water vapor tends to hang out, For 10 points: [10] Name the lowest layer of the atmosphere.
